content:
/>
V.iii.10.1.i
.
Revisions of the Skin Rating Schedule
Regulatory revisions to the rating schedule are generally not liberalizing, including those revisions to
38 CFR 4.118
effective on October 23, 2008, and August 13, 2018.
38 CFR 3.114(a)
does not apply because the regulatory change did not characterize the change as a liberalizing change of law or VA issue.
Reference
:  For more information on assigning effective dates based on regulatory updates to the rating schedule, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, 4.A.6
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 10 - Skin Conditions
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 10, Section None
